Task:

1. Select a Dataset: Choose a dataset from the denguedatahub package. You can find more details about denguedatahub at: https://denguedatahub.netlify.app/

3. Interpretation: Write a detailed interpretation of the chart, explaining the key insights, patterns, or trends observed in the dataset.
